title: 1950 World Cup Ticketholder Gets Tickets For 2014 Game
teaser: Sanch Belmot, 85, missed the 1950 World Cup final to be with his dying mom. Brazil lost that match. His old ticket will go into a museum in exchange for 3 tickets to this year's final.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
